channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road markings, 27th August
item.description:
Road markings need redoing also no giveway signage

item.title: Can’t see traffic lights, 27th August
item.description:
The trees on this road are totally hiding the traffic lights. It’s very dangerous and on a very fast road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Shipton

item.title: Abandoned shopping trolley with a traffic cone in, 27th August

item.title: Signs need cleaning, 27th August

item.title: Road has huge potholes, 26th August
item.description:
Road hasn’t be resurfaced for the ver 30 years. The road covering has degraded to the extent of revealing the stones under the tarmac. When cars are going over these they fly up and this endangers pedestrians and damages cars and property.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Ellison Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two mattresses and black seat padding dumped in alley, 25th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Hungerford Street, Cheltenham
